trans-unit.source: The ExtendedProtectionPolicy class represents the extended protection policy used by the server to validate incoming client connections.
trans-unit.target: ExtendedProtectionPolicy 클래스에는 들어오는 클라이언트 연결의 유효성을 검사 하는 서버에서 사용 되는 확장 된 보호 정책을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Any classes that expose the ExtendedProtectionPolicy class should not allow the setting of null policies, should supply a default policy, or should require an explicit policy to be created and set by the application developer or administrator.
trans-unit.target: Null 정책 설정 기본 정책을 제공 해야 하거나 명시적인 정책의을 만들고 응용 프로그램 개발자 또는 관리자가 설정 해야 합니다. ExtendedProtectionPolicy 클래스를 노출 하는 모든 클래스 하지 허용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> class that specifies when the extended protection policy should be enforced.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref> 확장된 보호 정책을 적용할 시기를 지정 하는 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: When this constructor is used to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> class, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A> property is set to the `policyEnforcement` parameter and the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.ProtectionScenario%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario>.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자의 새 인스턴스를 초기화 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>클래스는 <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A>속성이로 설정 되는 `policyEnforcement` 매개 변수 및 <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.ProtectionScenario%2A> <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario>.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario> 속성이</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.ProtectionScenario%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement"></xref> value that indicates when the extended protection policy should be enforced.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement"> </xref> 확장된 보호 정책을 적용할 시기를 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> class from a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that contains the required data to populate the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref> 에서 클래스는 <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> 채우는 데 필요한 데이터가 포함 된 개체는 <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This constructor implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable?displayProperty=fullName> interface for the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> class.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자는 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>클래스</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> 에 대 한 인터페이스</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable?displayProperty=fullName> 를 구현합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.System%23Runtime%23Serialization%23ISerializable%23GetObjectData%2A> method can be used to serialize an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.System%23Runtime%23Serialization%23ISerializable%23GetObjectData%2A>메서드를 사용 하 여 serialize 할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>개체입니다.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.System%23Runtime%23Serialization%23ISerializable%23GetObjectData%2A>

trans-unit.source: This serialized object can then be used with ExtendedProtectionPolicy to construct a new <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> object.
trans-unit.target: 이 serialize 된 개체 다음 사용 하 여 ExtendedProtectionPolicy를 새 <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>개체입니다.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance that contains the information that is required to serialize the new <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> 새 serialize 하는 데 필요한 정보를 포함 하는 인스턴스 <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref> 인스턴스.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains the source of the serialized stream that is associated with the new <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>새와 연결 된 serialize 된 스트림의 원본이 들어 있는 <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref> 인스턴스.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> class that specifies when the extended protection policy should be enforced and the channel binding token (CBT) to be used.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref> 확장된 보호 정책을 적용할 시기를 지정 하는 클래스 및 채널 바인딩 토큰 CBT ()를 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: When this constructor is used to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> class, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A> property is set to the `policyEnforcement` parameter, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomChannelBinding%2A> property is set to the `customChannelBinding` parameter, and the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.ProtectionScenario%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario>.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자의 새 인스턴스를 초기화 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>클래스는 <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A>속성이로 설정 되는 `policyEnforcement` 매개 변수를는 <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomChannelBinding%2A>속성이로 설정 되어는 `customChannelBinding` 매개 변수 및 <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.ProtectionScenario%2A> <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario>.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario> 속성이</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.ProtectionScenario%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomChannelBinding%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement"></xref> value that indicates when the extended protection policy should be enforced.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement"> </xref> 확장된 보호 정책을 적용할 시기를 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding> that contains a custom channel binding to use for validation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding>유효성 검사에 사용할 사용자 지정 채널 바인딩이 포함 되어 있는.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding>

trans-unit.source: policyEnforcement is specified as .
trans-unit.target: policyEnforcement로 지정 된 합니다.

trans-unit.source: customChannelBinding is .
trans-unit.target: customChannelBinding is .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> class that specifies when the extended protection policy should be enforced, the kind of protection enforced by the policy, and a custom Service Provider Name (SPN) list that is used to match against a client's SPN.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref> 확장된 보호 정책을 적용할 시기를 지정 하는 클래스, 보호 정책 및 클라이언트의 SPN에 대해 일치 하는 데 사용 되는 사용자 지정 서비스 공급자 이름 (SPN) 목록에 의해 적용의 종류입니다.

trans-unit.source: When this constructor is used to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> class, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A> property is set to the `policyEnforcement` parameter, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.ProtectionScenario%2A> property is set to the `protectionScenario` parameter, and the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomServiceNames%2A> property is set to the `customServiceNames` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자의 새 인스턴스를 초기화 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>클래스는 <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A>속성이로 설정 되어는 `policyEnforcement` 매개 변수는 <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.ProtectionScenario%2A>속성이로 설정 되어는 `protectionScenario` 매개 변수를 및 <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomServiceNames%2A>속성이로 설정 되어는 `customServiceNames` 매개 변수.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomServiceNames%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.ProtectionScenario%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement"></xref> value that indicates when the extended protection policy should be enforced.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement"> </xref> 확장된 보호 정책을 적용할 시기를 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario"></xref> value that indicates the kind of protection enforced by the policy.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario"> </xref> 보호 정책에 따라 적용의 종류를 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains the custom SPN list that is used to match against a client's SPN.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>클라이언트의 SPN에 대해 일치 하는 데 사용 되는 사용자 지정 SPN 목록이 들어 있는.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: policyEnforcement is specified as .
trans-unit.target: policyEnforcement로 지정 된 합니다.

trans-unit.source: customServiceNames is or an empty list.
trans-unit.target: customServiceNames 또는 빈 목록입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> class that specifies when the extended protection policy should be enforced, the kind of protection enforced by the policy, and a custom Service Provider Name (SPN) list that is used to match against a client's SPN.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref> 확장된 보호 정책을 적용할 시기를 지정 하는 클래스, 보호 정책 및 클라이언트의 SPN에 대해 일치 하는 데 사용 되는 사용자 지정 서비스 공급자 이름 (SPN) 목록에 의해 적용의 종류입니다.

trans-unit.source: When this constructor is used to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> class, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A> property is set to the `policyEnforcement` parameter, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.ProtectionScenario%2A> property is set to the `protectionScenario` parameter, and the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomServiceNames%2A> property is set to the `customServiceNames` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자의 새 인스턴스를 초기화 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>클래스는 <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A>속성이로 설정 되어는 `policyEnforcement` 매개 변수는 <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.ProtectionScenario%2A>속성이로 설정 되어는 `protectionScenario` 매개 변수를 및 <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomServiceNames%2A>속성이로 설정 되어는 `customServiceNames` 매개 변수.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomServiceNames%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.ProtectionScenario%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement"></xref> value that indicates when the extended protection policy should be enforced.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement"> </xref> 확장된 보호 정책을 적용할 시기를 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario"></xref> value that indicates the kind of protection enforced by the policy.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario"> </xref> 보호 정책에 따라 적용의 종류를 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection"></xref> that contains the custom SPN list that is used to match against a client's SPN.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection"> </xref> 클라이언트의 SPN에 대해 일치 하는 데 사용 되는 사용자 지정 SPN 목록이 들어 있는입니다.

trans-unit.source: policyEnforcement is specified as .
trans-unit.target: policyEnforcement로 지정 된 합니다.

trans-unit.source: customServiceNames is or an empty list.
trans-unit.target: customServiceNames 또는 빈 목록입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a custom channel binding token (CBT) to use for validation.
trans-unit.target: 유효성 검사에 사용할 사용자 지정 채널 바인딩 토큰을 CBT ()을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This read-only property represents a custom channel binding token to use for validation.
trans-unit.target: 이 읽기 전용 속성 유효성 검사에 사용할 사용자 지정 채널 바인딩 토큰을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: This is used in advanced scenarios when the CBT is provided by a custom outer channel.
trans-unit.target: CBT는 외부 사용자 지정 채널에서 제공 하는 경우이 고급 시나리오에서 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: An example scenario might use this property in combination with <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> and <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.
trans-unit.target: 예제 시나리오 <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>및 <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.</xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> </xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> 와 함께에서이 속성을 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding> that contains a custom channel binding to use for validation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding>유효성 검사에 사용할 사용자 지정 채널 바인딩이 포함 되어 있는.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding>

trans-unit.source: Gets the custom Service Provider Name (SPN) list used to match against a client's SPN.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 지정 공급자 이름 SPN (서비스) 목록은 클라이언트의 SPN에 대해 일치 하는 데를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This read-only property indicates the custom SPN list that is used to match against a client's SPN.
trans-unit.target: 이 읽기 전용 속성에는 클라이언트의 SPN에 대해 일치 하는 데 사용 되는 사용자 지정 SPN 목록을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: By default, the server will determine a default SPN list according to its registered endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로 서버는 기본 SPN 목록에 등록된 된 끝점에 따라 결정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For scenarios which require SPN checking, this property can be specified using a using a constructor to override the default list used to match against the client’s SPN.
trans-unit.target: SPN을 검사 해야 하는 시나리오에 대 한 클라이언트의 SPN에 대해 일치 하는 데 사용 되는 기본 목록을 재정의를 사용 하는 생성자를 사용 하 여이 속성을 지정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection"></xref> that contains the custom SPN list that is used to match against a client's SPN.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection"> </xref> 클라이언트의 SPN에 대해 일치 하는 데 사용 되는 사용자 지정 SPN 목록이 들어 있는입니다.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the operating system supports integrated windows authentication with extended protection.
trans-unit.target: 운영 체제 확장 된 보호와 함께 windows 통합된 인증을 지원 하는지 여부를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The changes to support extended protection are currently available for applications on Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2.
trans-unit.target: 확장 된 보호를 지원 하기 위해 변경 내용이 현재 Windows 7 및 Windows Server 2008 r 2에서 응용 프로그램에 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The extended protection features will be made available as updates for Windows Vista and Windows Server 2008.
trans-unit.target: 확장 된 보호 기능 사용 가능 하 게 업데이트와 Windows Vista 및 Windows Server 2008에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The extended protection features are not available on earlier versions of Windows.
trans-unit.target: 확장 된 보호 기능은 이전 버전의 Windows에서 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the operating system supports integrated windows authentication with extended protection, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>운영 체제 그렇지 않으면 확장 된 보호와 함께 windows 통합된 인증을 지원 하는지 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets when the extended protection policy should be enforced.
trans-unit.target: 확장 된 보호 정책이 적용 되는 경우를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This read-only property indicates when extended protection policy should be enforced (always, when supported by clients, or never).
trans-unit.target: 이 읽기 전용 속성 (항상 그렇지는 지원 되는 경우 클라이언트에서 또는 never) 확장된 보호 정책을 적용 시기를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement"></xref> value that indicates when the extended protection policy should be enforced.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement"> </xref> 확장된 보호 정책을 적용할 시기를 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the kind of protection enforced by the extended protection policy.
trans-unit.target: 확장 된 보호 정책에 의해 적용 된 보호의 종류를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This read-only property indicates the kind of protection enforced by the policy.
trans-unit.target: 이 읽기 전용 속성 보호 정책에 따라 적용의 종류를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario"></xref> value that indicates the kind of protection enforced by the policy.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario"> </xref> 보호 정책에 따라 적용의 종류를 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with the required data to serialize an <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 정보를 표시 한 <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> serialize 하는 데 필요한 데이터가 들어 있는 개체는 <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The ISerializable.GetObjectData method can be used to serialize an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> object.
trans-unit.target: ISerializable.GetObjectData 메서드를 사용 하 여 serialize 할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>개체입니다.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>

trans-unit.source: This serialized object can then be used with <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.%23ctor%28System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo%2CSystem.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext%29> to construct a new <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> object.
trans-unit.target: 이 serialize 된 개체 수와 함께 사용한 다음 <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.%23ctor%28System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo%2CSystem.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext%29>새 만들려고 <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>개체.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.%23ctor%28System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo%2CSystem.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext%29>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that holds the serialized data for an <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> 개체에 대 한 serialize 된 데이터를 보유 하는 <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains the destination of the serialized stream that is associated with the new <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>새와 연결 된 serialize 된 스트림의 대상이 들어 있는 <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string representation for the extended protection policy instance.
trans-unit.target: 확장 된 보호 정책 인스턴스에 대 한 문자열 표현을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> instance that contains the representation of the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>의 표현을 포함 하는 인스턴스는 <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref> 인스턴스.</xref:System.String>
